cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 7 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Basic Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Small loft in Te Nikau Lodge. Private single room. Te Nikau Lodge is a beautiful character home providing warm hospitality amongst the Nikau Palms. From the car its a two minute walk through the rainforest to Lodge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 3 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Mamaku Cottage is a self contained studio unit with garden views and a private deck.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 17th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 17th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
